text:
Yes. Not having to specify the 'dims' twice is a long-wanted feature, but I believe Base is holding out for a more general solution.
But the code in this PR is one line, so you could implement it in the package where you need it, if that makes your code nicer
<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/33130#issuecomment-562309110|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/33130#issuecomment-562309110>

E.g. 
```
_dropdims(f, args...; dims, kwargs...) = Base._dropdims(f(args...; kwargs..., dims=dims), dims)
```
